title: No train service between Downtown Line DT06 King Albert Park to DT07 Sixth Avenue

updates.text: DTL service has resumed since 8.25am. Free bus rides and bridging bus services have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
DTL service has resumed since 8.25am. Free bus rides and bridging buses are still available at designated bus stops.
No train svc btwn King Albert Pk DT6 & Sixth Ave DT7 due to platform screen door fault. Free bus rides available at designated bus stops.
No train service between Downtown Line DT06 Sixth Ave to DT07 King Albert's park. Free bus bridging available. Sorry for the inconvenience.
